Card.Name: Rescue
Card.RulesText: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Arcane Denial
Card.RulesText: Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

Card.Name: Stasis
Card.RulesText: Players skip their untap steps. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Stasis unless you pay {U}.

Card.Name: Energy Field
Card.RulesText: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you by sources you don't control. When a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, sacrifice Energy Field.

Card.Name: Daze
Card.RulesText: You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

Card.Name: Tidal Bore
Card.RulesText: You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. You may tap or untap target creature.

Card.Name: Propaganda
Card.RulesText: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

Card.Name: Annul
Card.RulesText: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.

Card.Name: Delusions of Mediocrity
Card.RulesText: When Delusions of Mediocrity enters the battlefield, you gain 10 life. When Delusions of Mediocrity leaves the battlefield, you lose 10 life.

Card.Name: Thwart
Card.RulesText: You may return three Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

Card.Name: Kismet
Card.RulesText: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

Card.Name: Gush
Card.RulesText: You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Draw two cards.

Card.Name: Force of Will
Card.RulesText: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

Card.Name: Feldon's Cane
Card.RulesText: {T}, Exile Feldon's Cane: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.

Card.Name: Ivory Tower
Card.RulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4.

Card.Name: Meekstone
Card.RulesText: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

Card.Name: Howling Mine
Card.RulesText: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

Card.Name: Tundra
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)

Card.Name: City of Brass
Card.RulesText: Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add one mana of any color.
